articles.description: The Russian has agreed to sell the Premier League side for £4.25billion to a consortium led by Los Angeles Dodgers part-owner Todd Boehly and backed by Clearlake Capital.
articles.content:
Roman Abramovich has bid an emotional farewell to Chelsea fans in a statement ahead of the completion of the club's takeover. 
The Russian has agreed to sell the Premier League side for £4.25billion… [+3209 chars]

articles.title: John Terry's controversial six months on Twitter after his spat with Rio Ferdinand - Daily Mail
articles.description: John Terry was seen arguing with former England team-mate Rio Ferdinand on Twitter. As a result, Sportsmail have taken at look at Terry's most controversial moments on Twitter.
articles.content:
John Terry has grabbed the headlines once again after taking to Twitter on Friday morning to argue with his former England team-mate Rio Ferdinand.
